#summary Detail on addItemAuction()

= Introduction =

Call this function to add a new auction item on Delcampe website.


= Details =

 * syntax : addItemAuction(string $token, $arrData)

 * parameter 1 : string : secret token
 * parameter 2 : array  : containing all the mandatory data to create an auction item

 * return : array : first element is the status (boolean) and second one is additional data
